text: Pontoise is a commune of the Val-d'Oise department in the northwestern suburbs of Paris, France. It is from the centre of Paris, in the "new town" of Cergy- Pontoise. ==Twin towns== Pontoise is twinned with: * BÃ¶blingen, Germany * Sevenoaks, England * Geleen, Netherlands == References == Category:Communes in Val-d'Oise Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Pontoise
